mapper.select: SELECT nvl(sum(ps_count),0) registAmount, nvl(sum(ps_price*ps_count),0) registSum, nvl(sum(bcount),0) sellAmount, nvl(sum(ps_price*bcount),0) sellSum, round(nvl(sum(bcount),0)/nvl(sum(ps_count),0)*100,2) rate ,months from (select productsell.ps_num, ps_count, ps_price, bcount, to_char(ps_udate,'yyyy-mm') months from productsell left outer join (select sum(b_count) bcount, ps_num from buy2dep group by ps_num) buydata on productsell.ps_num=buydata.ps_num) where ps_num = #{ps_num} group by months order by months desc
